label:
This is an email notification that is sent to the creator of the social post and the creator of the comment, when someone replies to a comment on the original social post.
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##ActivityTitle## - Head description of social
##FullName## - Name of the user who added a comment

template.subject: Social - comment replied
template.body: ##FullName## has replied to a comment on the post: ##ActivityTitle##
